name: The Sad Dudes
description:
In this super dumb game I made, your goal is to survive a hoard of sad dudes for a minute, while you wait for your stomach to empty. Once you have emptied your stomach, you can eat an enemy by running into them. Be careful though, for you can only last a few seconds without anything in your stomach.

Est. Time for completion: 5 - 10 minutes

Difficulty - Probably pretty difficult

CONTROL SCHEMES:
WASD, Arrow keys, Xbox Controller, Playstation Controller
